headline: Vistra to Report First Quarter Results on May 7, 2025
summary: Vistra (NYSE: VST) plans to report its first quarter 2025 financial and operating results on Wednesday, May 7, 2025, during a live conference call and webcast beginning at 10 a.m. ET (9 a.m. CT).

headline: LS Power eyes 300-MW colocated data center at Virginia power plant
summary: The plan raises reliability and cost allocation issues, Old Dominion Electric Cooperative told the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission on Friday.

headline: Vistra: Nuclear Powerhouse In The AI Era - Time To Buy
summary: Vistra's robust hedging book, improved credit profile, and clean energy exposure support a higher EV/EBITDA multiple. See why I rate VST stock a buy now.
